content: **this skinny crochet scarf pattern is the perfect thing to make and add to your handmade wardrobe the tapered ends are a great style feature ** **size ** written as one size but notes are within the pattern that state how to make adjustments for width length and different yarn weights **dimensions ** blocked 62 / 157 5 cm x 4 / 10 cm **stitches & techniques used ** chains slip_stitch single_crochet double_crochet following a special stitch instruction decreases front and back post stitches **yarn ** #2 sport weight - tippy tree yarns sport 240 yards 100% superwash merino a = main color we crochet upcycle alpaca blend sport 40 yards 33% alpaca 34% wool 33% acrylic b = accent or suitable substitutes **tools ** us size f/5 3 75 mm crochet hook yarn needle scissors blocking materials **other ** **read through all of the pattern notes before beginning** and please contact me if you ever have any questions about one of my patterns follow me on instagram @simplyhookedbyjanet join my facebook community and connect with other crochet enthusiasts https //www facebook com/groups/simplyhookedbyjanet copyright protected you may not redistribute pattern after purchase or publish any part as your own including photos you may sell finished products and if possible reference back to this pattern and/or give credit to simply hooked by janet as the original designer
